{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Administrative / Social Media Manager",
  "description": "Pruvia Integrated Limited, we are a human resources and management firm with a strong desire to ensure customer satisfaction in the midst of efficient and effective service delivery. As an organization we are driven by the dictum of&lsquo;Impossibility is Nothing&rsquo;. Our clients represent the entire spectrum of the Commerce, Hospitality, Information technology, Media, Finance &amp; Insurance Sector, Automobile, Oil &amp; Gas Sector, Real Estate, Manufacturing, FMCG and Small and Medium Enterprises and Communications industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative / Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Health

Job Summary


	We are seeking a dynamic, organized, and creative individual to join our team as a Receptionist and Social Media Coordinator. This role combines front-office duties, administrative support, and the responsibility for managing and creating content for the company&rsquo;s social media platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet visitors and clients with a warm, professional demeanor.
	Answer, screen, and direct incoming calls to the appropriate departments or personnel.
	Maintain a clean and organized front desk area.
	Receive, sort, and distribute mail, packages, and deliveries.
	Schedule and coordinate appointments, meetings, and conference room bookings.
	Maintain a log of visitors and employees entering and exiting the building.
	Perform data entry tasks to ensure accurate record-keeping and filing systems.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and other documents as requested by management.
	Ensure all visitors follow the required security protocols.
	Assist in managing office supplies, ordering new items when necessary.
	Assist with the preparation, filing, and maintenance of company documents and records.
	Coordinate and schedule company meetings, travel, and events.
	Provide general office administrative support, including photocopying, scanning, and faxing.


Social Media Coordinator Duties:


	Develop, create, and schedule content for social media platforms that align with the company&rsquo;s brand and marketing objectives.
	Engage with followers and respond to inquiries promptly, maintaining a positive brand image.
	Monitor and analyze social media trends and competitors to ensure our content stays relevant and engaging.
	Track and report on social media metrics, creating regular reports on engagement, reach, and campaign effectiveness.
	Coordinate with the marketing team to ensure alignment with marketing strategies and goals.
	Organize and manage social media campaigns, contests, and promotions.
	Ensure consistent branding and messaging across all social media platforms.


Skills and Qualifications


	HND/BSc in Office Administration, Social Media Marketing, or a related field is preferred.
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience in a receptionist or administrative assistant role.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and social media platforms and management tools (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter).
	Strong written and verbal communication skills with a creative and engaging writing style.
	Knowledge of basic social media analytics and reporting.
	Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.
	Strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and problem-solving abilities.
	Creative, with the ability to think outside the box for social media content.
	Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 / Month

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;jobpruvia@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-08-22",
  "validThrough": "2025-09-23",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Pruvia Integrated Limited"
    
  },

      "@type": "PostalAddress",

    }

Administrative / Social Media Manager Job at Pruvia Integrated Limited




        
    

        
        Pruvia Integrated Limited, we are a human resources and management firm with a strong desire to ensure customer satisfaction in the midst of efficient and effective service delivery. As an organization we are driven by the dictum of‘Impossibility is Nothing’. Our clients represent the entire spectrum of the Commerce, Hospitality, Information technology, Media, Finance & Insurance Sector, Automobile, Oil & Gas Sector, Real Estate, Manufacturing, FMCG and Small and Medium Enterprises and Communications industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Administrative / Social Media Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Health
     

            
    



Job Summary


	We are seeking a dynamic, organized, and creative individual to join our team as a Receptionist and Social Media Coordinator. This role combines front-office duties, administrative support, and the responsibility for managing and creating content for the company’s social media platforms.


Key Responsibilities


	Greet visitors and clients with a warm, professional demeanor.
	Answer, screen, and direct incoming calls to the appropriate departments or personnel.
	Maintain a clean and organized front desk area.
	Receive, sort, and distribute mail, packages, and deliveries.
	Schedule and coordinate appointments, meetings, and conference room bookings.
	Maintain a log of visitors and employees entering and exiting the building.
	Perform data entry tasks to ensure accurate record-keeping and filing systems.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and other documents as requested by management.
	Ensure all visitors follow the required security protocols.
	Assist in managing office supplies, ordering new items when necessary.
	Assist with the preparation, filing, and maintenance of company documents and records.
	Coordinate and schedule company meetings, travel, and events.
	Provide general office administrative support, including photocopying, scanning, and faxing.


Social Media Coordinator Duties:


	Develop, create, and schedule content for social media platforms that align with the company’s brand and marketing objectives.
	Engage with followers and respond to inquiries promptly, maintaining a positive brand image.
	Monitor and analyze social media trends and competitors to ensure our content stays relevant and engaging.
	Track and report on social media metrics, creating regular reports on engagement, reach, and campaign effectiveness.
	Coordinate with the marketing team to ensure alignment with marketing strategies and goals.
	Organize and manage social media campaigns, contests, and promotions.
	Ensure consistent branding and messaging across all social media platforms.


Skills and Qualifications


	HND/BSc in Office Administration, Social Media Marketing, or a related field is preferred.
	Minimum of 2 years of proven experience in a receptionist or administrative assistant role.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook) and social media platforms and management tools (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter).
	Strong written and verbal communication skills with a creative and engaging writing style.
	Knowledge of basic social media analytics and reporting.
	Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.
	Strong attention to detail, organizational skills, and problem-solving abilities.
	Creative, with the ability to think outside the box for social media content.
	Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 / Month

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobpruvia@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "title": "Electrical Engineer",
  "description": "ICL Support Services Limited (Rc:679920) is an organization established with the primary objective of providing fast, efficient, reliable and cost-effective corporate support service solutions to a wide range of clients. Primary amongst these classes of services is Recruitment, Outsourcing and Personnel Support Services to our corporate clients. The company also provides telecommunications support services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Agric, Ojo - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Designs, develops, tests, and supervises the manufacturing, installation, and maintenance of electrical systems and equipment, including everything from power generation and distribution to communication systems, motors, and electronics.
	Key responsibilities include using computer-aided design (CAD) software to create plans, ensuring compliance with safety codes, collaborating with teams, managing project timelines, troubleshooting issues, and overseeing the operation of electrical system.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Resume and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;iclgroupsgsl@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Electrical Engineer Job at ICL Support Services Limited




        
    

        
        ICL Support Services Limited (Rc:679920) is an organization established with the primary objective of providing fast, efficient, reliable and cost-effective corporate support service solutions to a wide range of clients. Primary amongst these classes of services is Recruitment, Outsourcing and Personnel Support Services to our corporate clients. The company also provides telecommunications support services.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Electrical Engineer

Job Location: Agric, Ojo - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Designs, develops, tests, and supervises the manufacturing, installation, and maintenance of electrical systems and equipment, including everything from power generation and distribution to communication systems, motors, and electronics.
	Key responsibilities include using computer-aided design (CAD) software to create plans, ensuring compliance with safety codes, collaborating with teams, managing project timelines, troubleshooting issues, and overseeing the operation of electrical system.


Salary
N100,000 - N120,000 / month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their Resume and Cover Letter to: iclgroupsgsl@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Content Creator / Social Media Influencer",
  "description": "Aspom Travels and Tours is a travel company that offers a wide range of services to facilitate both individual and corporate travel plans. Our services include Visa assistance, Flight reservations, Hotel bookings, Birth services and Planning different tour packages to suit the needs and preferences of our customers. Our agency is committed to providing efficient and high-quality services atcompetitive rates.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Social Media Influencer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities

Content Creator / Social Media Influencer Job at Aspom Travels and Tours




        
    

        
        Aspom Travels and Tours is a travel company that offers a wide range of services to facilitate both individual and corporate travel plans. Our services include Visa assistance, Flight reservations, Hotel bookings, Birth services and Planning different tour packages to suit the needs and preferences of our customers. Our agency is committed to providing efficient and high-quality services atcompetitive rates.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Social Media Influencer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Create high-quality content for various platforms, including;social media, blogs, and websites.
	Develop and implement content strategies to meet business objectives.
	Conduct research to identify trends and best practices in content creation.
	Analyze content performance to inform future content strategies.
	Collaborate with internal teams to ensure brand consistency and messaging.


Requirements


	Minimum of HND / B.Sc Degree in Mass Communication, Journalism, or any related field.
	2 - 3 years of experience in content creation or related field.
	Excellent writing, editing, and creative skills.
	Ability to work as independently as part of a team.
	Porficient in content management systems and social media platforms.


Benefits and Incentives


	Competitive Salary.
	Opportunities for career growth and development.
	Collaborative and dynamic work environment.
	Performance-based bonuses and inncentives.
	Professional training and development programs.

title: Job Vacancies at Helean Global Limited
content:
Helean Global Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in Nigeria with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their businesses through our core services.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Human Resources Officer

Job Location: Lagos (Hybrid)
Employment Type: Contract

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Partner with management to support workforce planning, talent acquisition, and employee development initiatives
	Act as a strategic partner to the Management to understand their business objectives and develop HR strategies to support them
	Facilitate the performance management process, including goal setting, performance reviews
	Ensure compliance with labor laws and company policies
	Provide coaching and support to managers and employees on HR-related matters


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field
	2 - 3 years of experience as an HR Business Partner
	Strong understanding of HR policies, procedures, and employment laws
	Experience in a sales-focused environment is key
	Willing to work on-site 2days per week.


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Application Closing Date: 7th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@heleanglobal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

2.) Human Resource Generalist

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Talent Acquisition & Management:


	Responsible for talent acquisition and recruitment processes.
	Organize quarterly and annual employee performance reviews.


Learning & Development:


	Develop and implement training programs
	Coordinate and track employee training and development programs.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, or relevant field
	Hands-on experience with Human Resources Information Systems HRIS, SAP Success factors
	Proven work experience as an HR Specialist or HR Generalist, preferably in a Multinational, FMCG industry
	Provide support to employees in various HR-related topics such as leaves and compensation, etc.
	Manage the development of the Benefits program and its adequate implementation and communication.


Compensation & Benefits


	Salary budget is N350,000 Net plus other benefits
	Administer benefits, payroll, and compensation programs


Application Closing Date: 8th September, 2025.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@heleanglobal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Factory Processing Supervisor 

Job Location: Mowe, Ogun 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Supervising all coordinators in the section to ensure production targets are met.
	Monitoring daily performance and ensuring worker productivity is not less than 8 kg per person per day.
	Ensuring lot efficiencies are achieved: Wholes ≥ 88%, Pieces ≤ 7%, Powder & Husk ≤ 5%.
	Managing absenteeism and ensuring manpower availability of 300–320 workers.
	Controlling rework to a maximum of 5% of daily production.
	Ensuring Work-In-Progress (WIP) is not more than 3 days per lot.
	Organizing skill development training for new workers on productivity and quality.
	Conducting refresher training for low-performing workers based on daily reviews.
	Addressing worker concerns and motivating them to meet daily targets.
	Coordinating with the expat manager for smooth daily operations.
	Submitting daily production, quality, and manpower reports.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree with 5 - 7 years of work experience.


Salary
N400,000 - N500,000 monthly Net.

Application Closing Date: 1st September, 2025.

Method of Appliocation
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@heleanglobal.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply
